title: Taliban to announce ‘Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan’ from presidential palace
content:
1. Taliban to announce ‘Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan’ from presidential palace  The Times of Israel
  2. Kabul in panic as Taliban fighters tighten grip  Al Jazeera English
  3. Afghanistan President Ghani Flees The Country Amid Kabul Collapse to Taliban  MSNBC
  4. Taliban victory? Despite collapse in Kabul, withdrawal was the right course in Afghanistan  USA TODAY
